title: Bluetooth Speaker, Zamkol Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speakers Waterproof, Powerful 24W with 360° Bass Sound, Bluetooth 4.2 for Outdoor Party, Beach, Shower
feature_list: ♫【Excellent Sound Quality】Zamkol Bluetooth Speakers has 24W twin subwoofer stereo sound, pumps out crisp treble, detailed mids, and resonating Double Bass for enjoying music!
♫【360° Stereo Sound & TWS Technology】 360° surround sound, and use TWS technology the audio can be played in sync on both Wireless Speaker,creating an exclusive cinema auditory feast.
♫【IPX6 Waterproof】IPX6 protection. Use by the pool, rest on the beach, sing in the shower. No matter where the music should be, waterproof speaker are suitable and ready.
♫【Long Playing Time】Portable speaker provide up to 6~10 hours playtime. 3.5mm AUX jack makes it possible TV and non-Bluetooth devices to play audio through the speakers.
♫【100% After-Sale Service】Our offer 30 days full refund replacement, warranty replacement service within 12 months, 24-hour mail consultation service to make you peace of mind to use the speaker.
